Articles.Content:
So, I found this mod, which allows for certain parts that the mod has added in to have gravity, so I downloaded and it kinda worked, but the objects that were pulled in clipped into the model of the gravitational object (the parts in this mod) I tried all of the objects, but everything clipped through them and it looked weird, the craft were not destroyed when I touched said objects, but it made no sense. I know this is a closed thread, It wasn't created by me, and I know that it is from 0.14 also, but I thought it was an awesome Idea SQUAD needed to incorporate into stock KSP. So here is the link, for those interested in reviving:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/9808-Plugin-0-14-4-Part-gravity-v1-0

Hope to see this again soon, updated to 0.90.0 or a later version, so please, please, recreate this mod.

Thank you moderators for your time and More ambitious ideas for a new mod like this, or simply, a revival. You may have to ask the mod creator for permission, but I personally think this mod should not go to waste.

Thanks once more,

Astrofox
